title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: Cook the spaghetti in a large pot of salted boiling water.
Fry the pancetta until it is crispy.
Beat the eggs in a bowl and stir in the cheeses.
Drain the pasta and mix with the pancetta and egg mixture.
Serve with more cheese and freshly ground black pepper.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato-based gravy.
instructions: Marinate the chicken in the tikka masala paste and grill until cooked.
In a pan, fry the onions until soft.
Add the tomato passata and simmer for 10 minutes.
Stir in the grilled chicken and cook for a further 5 minutes.
Finish by adding cream and garnish with fresh coriander.
